data.title: Simon Templeman
data.meta_description: Simon Templeman (born around 1954) is an English voice actor who is known for his roles as Kain in Crystal Dynamics' Legacy of Kain and Teryn Loghain Mac Tir in Bioware's Dragon Age. He also provided additional voices in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. He is the husband of Rosalind Chao...
data.text:
Simon Templeman (born around 1954)[source?] is an English voice actor who is known for his roles as Kain in Crystal Dynamics' Legacy of Kain and Teryn Loghain Mac Tir in Bioware's Dragon Age. He also provided additional voices in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.

He is the husband of Rosalind Chao who played Keiko O'Brien on two different Star Trek series (most notably Deep Space Nine). He even played John Bates on Star Trek: The Next Generation in the episode "The Defector".

Star Wars voice works[]
